oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sunday Down South - 1954-03-28 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Sunday Down South, sponsored by Lion Oil. Originally broadcast 1954-03-28, part 2. Personnel include Buddy Hall (host, performer), David Cobb (announcer), Owen Bradley (conductor) and the Lion Orchestra (performer), the Anita Kerr Singers (performers), Dolores Watson (performer), and Helen Traubel (performer). Hosted at the Ryman Auditorium.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Hall; Anita Kerr Singers; Owen Bradley; Lion Orchestra; Helen Traubel
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Dolores Watson and Helen Traubel talk -- Anytime (Buddy Hall) -- Buddy Hall, Helen Traubel and Dolores Watson talk -- Tennessee Wig Walk (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Lion Oil commercial (David Cobb, Buddy Hall) -- Buddy Hall and Helen Traubel talk -- I Believe (Helen Traubel) -- David Cobb and Helen Traubel talk -- Y'All Come (Buddy Hall, Anita Kerr Singers) -- David Cobb presents Helen Traubel with flowers -- Helen Traubel talks -- Closing statement (David Cobb) -- Theme (Got The South In My Soul)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Sunday down south (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Cobb, David (Announcer); Hall, Buddy (Singer); Traubel, Helen; Watson, Dolores; Anita Kerr Singers; Bradley, Owen; Lion Orchestra (Musical group)
